Events.Text: Say hello and ask for directions (see left panel). [instruction 1 of 4]
Hello, I need directions
what is the travel mode?
Do you want to drive, walk, or use public transit?
My feet are tired, I would like to use public transportation
where are you departing from?
When are you going to start your trip?
right now 2pm
If you haven't yet, start a game of trivia with the assistant while you're getting directions (see left panel). [instruction 2 of 4]
what is your departure location?
Where are you departing from?
Broadway and main. I want to play some trivia,
where will you be going?
Where do you need to go?
Lets put that on hold for now, Ill get back to that, I would like to play some trivia
which number should we start from?
At what question would you like to start?
start at 6
Also ask for more details on some instructions. [instruction 3 of 4]

Item.Question: A 3 1/2' floppy disk measures ____ & 1/2 inches across

PrimaryItem.Question: A 3 1/2' floppy disk measures ____ & 1/2 inches across

Events.Text: what is the length of floppy disk?

PrimaryItem.Question: A 3 1/2' floppy disk measures ____ & 1/2 inches across

Events.Text: A 3 1/2' floppy disk measures ____ & 1/2 inches across
three
Keep going until you've arrived at your destination. Then bring the conversation to a natural close. [instruction 4 of 4]

PrimaryItem.Question: A 3 1/2' floppy disk measures ____ & 1/2 inches across

Events.Text: You are right

PrimaryItem.Question: A 3 1/2' floppy disk measures ____ & 1/2 inches across

Events.Text: Your answer was correct! Great job! Would you like to continue playing?
No lets go back to my ride, I need to go to the University

PrimaryItem.Question: A 3 1/2' floppy disk measures ____ & 1/2 inches across

DetailedTransitInstructions: Go to the bus stop at the corner of the intersection. The stop will be in front of a barbershop.
Take the 28X to Forbes and Atwood. You will travel 8 stops and it will take 15 minutes.
Walk in the same direction as the bus for 1 block. You will pass a school on your right.
Cross the street at the football field and immediately turn left.
Your destination will be on the right and you should see a McDonalds beside it.

Scenario.UserTask:
You want directions from 'Broadway and Main' to 'University', leaving now (2 pm). As the assistant gives you the directions, alternate randomly between (i) asking for the next instruction, (ii) asking for more details, and (iii) asking for the next trivia question (start at question 6)

 The AI Assistant can handle:
- Giving trip directions
- Playing trivia
Scenario.WizardTask:
Follow the flow charts and help the user. Assume:

- Today is Monday the 7th, 2 pm

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
